narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Georgetown Treatment Specialists LLC is a Clinic/Center, Methadone Clinic provider based in Georgetown, SC. From 2023-01 through 2024-12, this provider received $275K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 91% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: G2067 (G2067). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
